title: Client Update Open Beta Now Live

replies.body: This is the WORST version I have ever used, it is so inconvenient and it made me lag so bad. I couldn't discuss with my teammates because of the lag that it brought.

> [{quoted}](name=VdP Moyanlee,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=G5jkj415,comment-id=00c8,timestamp=2016-11-16T23:27:57.346+0000)
>
> This is the WORST version I have ever used, it is so inconvenient and it made me lag so bad. I couldn't discuss with my teammates because of the lag that it brought.
 


+1
Edit: AYYYYYY and it should be live in NA and many other regions!
Will it then be open in all regions, or just NA?
All regions! It's a rolling launch. Only region that may see some delays is Korea.
How about China?
Uhhhhh China is weird. It would be a patch or two later.

> [{quoted}](name=Cactopus,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=G5jkj415,comment-id=00050000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-15T20:02:34.244+0000)
>
> Uhhhhh China is weird.

I agree entirely.
Tanks rito now I cant play
wut happened bb
Super laggy during the champ select, sometimes ppl can't even adjust their masteries or runes page.
It's really lagging for me, the animations may be just too much for my comp to handle. The older version didn't have so much and ran smoother.
How do I cancel update؟

It's shit. It's utter shit. I wish I hadn't downloaded this beta, because I'm pretty sure it just lost me a ranked game. The lobby is slow as hell on my computer, framerate is terrible, and in-game my screen froze for up to 20 whole seconds, the music just cut out at one point, and it took me at least double as long to load into the game in the first place. I do not think this can all just be my computer getting a little "uppety". Seriously guys, what the hell?

I have yet to experience this issue and I've been running the client since alpha. It sounds like you are experiencing a RAM issue, on top of whatever problem you may be facing. And don't start off your comment by trashing years of hard work on a game that you've been playing completely free. Learn to verbalize your concerns better. This is still in beta and issues with optimization are to be expected. Launch the legacy if you're unhappy.
Am I the only one not finding the item sets?

I understand this is Beta but I downloaded and the game doesn't launch anymore, the "it's Beta" excuse is applicable when you doesn't have an almost demanding update that takes the entire screen. Have to reinstall now.
Yo, hold on! Where in the process does it fail for you? Give me some specifics. We're asking people to upgrade so we can solve problems like this for everyone.
I upgraded then clicked on launch, nothing happens.

EDIT/DISCLAIMER: This is not a fix-all, just a common problem people were having. So sometimes you might have to file a support ticket. If it says it can't find files, that means it's not referencing correctly or the files were not installed for some reason. ("referencing" meaning it can't find where you put the files on your computer when you start the program. An uninstall and reinstall usually fixes this. If not all files are being installed, same fix, but if that doesn't work, there's probably a more technical issue that might need a support ticket.) 

Relaunching gives a "Close previous instance to relaunch" and that's when the first instance displays the Dark Blue window of the client. It freezes and stops loading in-general after a point. No activity via the control panel, just that it's open.

Specifically opening the client opens the same launcher as last version. (Dunno if that's a different launcher now.) Post-clicking the Orange "LAUNCH" button gives the above results.

Okay, after reviewing stuff written on the boards, it might be something to do with the Launcher not being replaced when upgrading. Which is to say the Desktop icon should be replaced and that the Launcher doesn't exist anymore.

So opening the client via the old Launcher is potentially causing the issue.

So try:
This PC> Windows (C:) > Riot Games > League of Legends
(This is my pathing, your computer might use a different main drive depending on where you installed it.)

Look for the **Circle** icon for League in that folder and create a Shortcut.
(Create a shortcut via right-clicking on the icon and "Create shortcut", drag and drop shortcut where you want it to go, desktop or start-bar or etc...)
Open via the Circle icon.

Otherwise: Reinstall can fix the issue according to some boards posts. :|

Looks like it opened correctly via the new Launch icon.

BUG being: Client not replacing old launcher icon upon installation.
it worked for me doing it your way! :D
The window size is a little too large for my laptop screen, is there any way to adjust it? I can't hit the chat buttons at the bottom...
resize using cntrl - and cntrl +
But dont do this in your baning phase because your client will probaly freeze and you get - LP
How can i deinstall this f u c k Client without deinstalling the whole game?

Hey, the best way to go back to the legacy client is clicking the "Launch Legacy Client" link on the login screen. IF for some reason you're having problems getting to that screen, try this:

- Go to your install folder (default: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system 
- Open user.cfg with notepad
- Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no 
- Save and launch League of Legends again.
Will champ select animations be turned on?
Yep, but we're gonna work on some performance tuning first.
i cant get in  its only a black client{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I've heard about this bug. Can you share your specs and operating system info?
Cannot find "Purchase a rune page" in the alpha client store. Any help pls?

Yeah right now it's pretty borked. You actually can find it on the same pages as the runes, but you have to make sure you're "show all" on all tabs instead of just tier 3 runes. That's obviously not great so we've got a fix planned
Unfortunately the only fix I have found for this is to change your screens resolution. At least until you are logged in.
Resize using cntrl + and cntrl -

Are the optimization problems within the client (mainly mastery editing during champ selelct) here already?

Or is that tomorrow?

We've been improving masteries and other performance things, but I wouldn't say that all our optimization problems are solved. With all these new people coming in, we're bound to find new ones. But that's alright, that's what beta is for!
when we can get the icon?
If you logged into the alpha, it should be within a week from now.

Okay, I usually get on here complaining...but not today! 

Absolute homerun with new client! no issues so far, absolutely gorgeous graphics.  Riot hit a home run this time.  Thanks from those of us who spend way too much time playing your game.

yay

it's still buggy tho for some people so keep your thoughts and prayers with us lol
Any news on a fix for Vista users?

>

Don't use Vista? Vista is the worst operating system from 1990s to now.

A lot of the new client looks nice - I like that there's more info about champions & abilities and match history.

Biggest concern: RAM hog, omg does my whole computer slow down. Takes a long time to do anything.

Biggest feature request: the return of item viewer & item sets.

Personal style issue: I don't flat icons for everything. The red and blue crafting crystals especially. 
Also doesn't show I have mastery with locked Champions, even though I do.

What decides what champion is on your bio screen?

Looks like i'm not the only one who can't play now that I have accepted the patch?  I updated and now my client remains a big navy blue box.  Decided to uninstall and reinstall.  Maybe that will help.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Hey SithLordLady, we're working to get some more clarity around this issue.  Can you walk me through what you did to get the blue screen?

One of the posts above mentioned that they accidentally launched using the old Launcher instead of the new LeagueClient launcher in their Riot Games folder.

I used the old launcher from my desktop, no new launcher/icon appeared on my desktop.

*edit*
i did now find the new launcher withing the c:>riot games>league of legends folder on my pc, but now trying to launch there I received a message that a file in the alpha was corrupted and to reinstall.
If you go to your C:/RiotGames folder there should be a new launcher in there.  If you launch from there you should be good to go.

Is there an update regarding the sorting of the recently played (once people learn where it is).
It's really random right now and hard to add people.
Yeah I think we've got some upcoming improvements for that
